message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's worth more to you than to me, so I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand your budget is tight, but $90 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $105 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100. That's the lowest I can go.
